title: [Skript]关于脚本的问题
author: 浅梦l
txt_content:
[spoileron mine of normal wood block:
    player is holding a stone_axe
    if {stone_axe.%player%} is not set:
        set {stone_axe.%player%} to 100
    remove 4 from {stone_axe.%player%}
    repair tool of player
    if {stone_axe.%player%} is smaller than 0:
        remove a stone_axe from player
        set {stone_axe.%player%} to 100
    set name of player's tool to "&f石斧 %{stone_axe.%player%}% %%"  复制代码
[/spoiler]这样写的话只能实现一个石斧，不能做到多个。可是我也不知道该怎么想了，能帮我改改代码吗
